ygData.subject: Cybertronian Fire - Eat Your Heart Out

Subject: Cybertronian Fire - Eat Your Heart Out
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type:  text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding:  7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

(I'd appreciate someone posting damage for the CF)

The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Nemesis
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:



Demon Wulf's eyes glowed a bright red and a single optic blast shot out from 
his eyes at Dark One's left wing.

---

Dark Claw felt a fire ball hit his heavily armored form.  "Fool, you can't 
harm me, I'm Vok!" he screamed, launching two more missiles at Pyro.

---

Flesh Ripper's arms were barely being held at bay by the relatively weak 
Hiss, and that distraction was perfect.  Flesh Ripper fired off a single 
blast at Hiss' chest.

---

Dark One gained altitude rapidly to avoid the laser blast.  "Understood." he 
replied to Zardus, firing off ten rapid blasts down at the now enemy Vok.

---

Breakdown took out his grenade launcher, charging for Dark Claw to get into 
firing range to bombard him.

---

Pyro drove full speed, one missile missing and the other hitting its target 
and smashing a dent that looked like it was ready to give into his side.  
"BURN IN THE PIT!" he screamed, activating his left missile launcher, 
launching to energy-signature seeking rockets off at Dark Claw.

---

Hiss felt the laser blast burn into his chest and for a split second his grip 
on Flesh Ripper's wrists loosened because of the pain, and that was all the 
Vok needed.  Hiss let out a scream as he felt claws dig into chest.

---

Scavenger came to a sudden halt, the abrupt stop sending Flesh Ripper 
flipping backwards and smashing through the windshield of the HUMV, slamming 
into the hood and rolling off into the grass.

---

Nemesis hovered for a second, looking over the battle and raising his rifle 
to point at Sinnertwin's back area, nineteen laser blasts heading for the 
Decepticon from behind.

---

Scattershot raised his own rifle, getting a good aim and firing off twenty 
armor-piercing rounds at Demon Wulf's left arm.  "Take that ya traitor!"

---

Imprisoner didn't long before firing another four missiles at the 
Cybertronian Fire, two from each mounted missile launchers.

Predator took out his plasma rifle, firing off three bolts of plasma energy 
at the CF.

Choran set up a mortar, putting in a grenade and watching it launch into the 
air, heading down rapidly towards the CF.

---

Hot Spot turned to see his fellow Protectobots under attack, and fired off a 
long blast of flame at Headstrong.

---

Groove stopped, throwing his photon pistol into the air and taking his twin 
vaporators out before the pistol had even gone into his subspace pocket.  
Raising his twin vaporators he shot off a long jet of freezing vapors at 
Sinnertwin.

---

Blades reloaded his 30mm cannons, launching off 20 more explosive rounds at 
Rampage.

---

First Aid, not expecting anything, was taken by surprised and when he jumped 
he was hit with two blasts that sent him twisting through the air and 
crashing to the ground.

---

Streetwise rolled out of the way of the electricity and stood up, pohoton 
pistol raised but was struck in the side with two blasts.  Letting out a 
slight grunt, he painfully turned to face Headstrong.  "Decepticlown 
trash..." he muttered, trying to ignore the memories that were surfacing.  He 
raised his pistol, firing off three pohoton blasts at Headstrong's torso.
